Overview

This article provides information about the backup process, including data retention periods and the procedure for requesting and handling backup restorations.

 

Information

This guide covers the backup retention policy and the step-by-step process for handling backup restoration requests from customers.

  • Backup Retention
  • Backup Restoration Process

 

Backup Retention

Backups are retained for a specific period to ensure data recovery capabilities:

  • Data backups can be precisely restored for each day of the last eight weeks.
  • This information is sourced from the TECHNICAL & ORGANIZATIONAL MEASURES FOR DATA PROTECTION document, version 1.55.

 

Backup Restoration Process

Follow these steps when handling a backup restoration request:

Step 1: Clarify Customer Requirements

- Discuss with the customer which specific data needs to be restored.
- If the customer accidentally deleted data, always check the Admin-Log to verify the customer's claims.
- Document the results of the Admin-Log check in the ticket.

Step 2: Create an Offer

- Prepare an offer using the template located at: P:\ceur\GTM.CEUR\PS.CEUR\PS.SUPPORT.CEUR\04_Abrechnungen
- For Unipark: Use the Unipark ToDo file
- Use the file: Auftrag_DEUTSCH_2021-08.doc

Step 3: Obtain Customer Approval

- Have the customer sign the offer (For Unipark: Use Unipark ToDo)

Step 4: Process Internal Order

- Only after customer approval, fill out the Internal Order form (For Unipark: Use Unipark ToDo)
- Forward the case to technical support

Step 5: Inform Customer

- Once the mirror installation is available, notify the customer

Step 6: Monitor Mirror Installation

- The mirror installation is available for 14 days
- The case owner keeps the ticket open during this period and manages the deletion process

Step 7: Delete Mirror Installation

- After 14 days, forward the case to Technical Support for deletion of the mirror installation

Step 8: Handle Invoicing

- Don't forget to process the invoice. Refer to the "Invoicing in Netsuite (e.g. Mirror Installation, Training)" guide for details.

 

FAQ

How long are the data backups retained?

Backups for each day of the last eight weeks can be precisely restored.

Where can I find the source document for backup retention information?

The information is sourced from the TECHNICAL & ORGANIZATIONAL MEASURES FOR DATA PROTECTION document, version 1.55. A link to the document in Dropbox is provided in the original guide.

How long is the mirror installation available for the customer?

The mirror installation is available for 14 days. After this period, it must be deleted.
